_header: When dread of God is within
_description: A single couplet in a Latin sermon

CamJes13.Transcription:
qwan drede of god ys wyt ynnehe dryuyt a way al dedly
                    synne
CamJes13.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild. 
             A Register of Middle English Religious & Didactic Verse.
         2 vols. London: Oxford University Press for the Bibliographical
            Society: 1916-20: 1.212.
